title: Harland & Wolff
summary: Harland & Wolff is a shipyard, specialising in ship repair, conversion, and offshore construction, located in Belfast, Northern Ireland.  Harland & Wolff is famous for having built the majority of the ocean liners for the White Star Line.[1] Well-known ships built by Harland & Wolff include the Olympic-class trio: RMS Titanic, RMS Olympic and HMHS Britannic, the Royal Navy's HMS Belfast, Royal Mail Line's Andes, Shaw Savill's Southern Cross, Union-Castle's RMS Pendennis Castle, and P&O's Canberra. Harland and Wolff's official history, Shipbuilders to the World, was published in 1986.[2]
